[[inst_v_shfli_down]]
==== V.SHFLI.DOWN

*Syntax:* v.shfli.down SrcL.<T>, SrcR.<T>, imm, ->Dst.<W>

*Description:* Shuffle (down): permutes vector elements using immediate indices.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_v_shfli_down_part1.svg[V.SHFLI.DOWN encoding,width=800]

*Group:* VEC/VEC
